about.label: COMPANY PROFILE
about.title: Design, Construction & Supervision of Technical Works
about.p1: ARMAKAT Construction & Engineering provides end-to-end design, construction, and supervision services, from small-scale renovations to complex development projects.
about.p2: We combine over 30 years of experience in the construction sector with modern technologies such as BIM, energy studies, and building automation. Our goal is for every building to be functional, energy-efficient, and easy to manage.
about.p3: We operate with clear schedules, detailed budgets, and continuous client updates, so you always know the status of your project and what you are paying for.
